tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demand_response_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_energy_reduction FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE program (
  program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP,
  energy_reduction_target FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE participant (
  participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  program_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE demand_response_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  energy_savings_percentage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  program_id INT,
  is_active BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES demand_response_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_usage_data (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  reading_date DATE,
  energy_usage FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE demand_response_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  energy_savings DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name STRING,
  address STRING,
  phone_number STRING,
  program_id INT REFERENCES demand_response_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    device_type TEXT,
    mac_address TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    event_type TEXT,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    response_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES programs(program_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
)
